About Us

Why you Should Invest

Why Investment is so important

Unlike paper money, Bitcoin and other cryptocurrencies are produced mathematically and held digitally. The people who voluntarily offer their computing power to secure these cryptocurrency networks are called miners. Cryptocurrencies don’t have a central government or other so-called ‘middlemen’ that decide about the future of the system. – They are in fact digital, borderless democracies in which miners vote with their computing power to reach order and consensus

Contributing to the ecosystem

we are actively contributing to the cryptocurrency ecosystem, from launching awareness campaigns to releasing open-source investment software. Your investment outputs will be added to your account daily and automatically

Highly Experienced

We are building investment data centers around the world that are able to support 6 investment algorithms for 10+ different cryptocurrencies. If that’s not enough, we’d be happy to also support the ones you want to mine!

{/* */}

FAQ

It’s quick and very easy! As soon as your payment is confirmed your contract will be added to your profile. You can directly see this from your dashboard.

Remark: Everyday, after the mining day is over, profit will be processed and sent to all investors account.

Investment and Profit outputs are generated daily, but you will receive your outputs only once they have accumulated to a certain quantity. We strongly recommend that all investments should be allowed for a minimum of 14days after which the full cycle must have been completed in order to attract the 30% commission on your investment. You can track your investment daily fom your dashoabrd. These minimum investment outputs are set in order to avoid that customers pay excessive fees for receiving small amounts in their wallets.

We currently accept investments only in Bitcoin. You login to your dashboard and then request to make an investment. A wallet address is automatically generated for you to make the deposit. Fill out the form and upload a proof that you made payment to the address that was provided. When this is confirmed, you will get an email notification and your dashboard will be updated accordingly.

Due to increased scam in the investment industry, we understand that this question is quite obvious. With an extensive experience of more than 5 years, GIT possesses 1500+ well-qualified IT professionals. Global Investment Trading is backed by Cyfuture, a leader in running and managing data centers across the globe for thousands of customers. Therefore, you are completely secured and are in safe hands with the investment in GIT

Yes, for investments above $4,000. Global Investment Trade will take full responsibility if any issue arise in the future.
